description: This is a ViewModel class for the Notes feature in an Android application. It manages the data for notes, handles search queries, and communicates with the NoteRepository to perform database operations asynchronously.

classes.name: NotesViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel for managing notes data, handling search queries, and performing database operations in a lifecycle-aware manner.

methods.name: setSearchQuery
methods.description: Sets the search query string to filter notes.

methods.name: upsert
methods.description: Inserts or updates a note in the database asynchronously.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note from the database asynchronously.
